ModMetadata.Name: LoxVMod
ModMetadata.Author: Stephanus Schragen
ModMetadata.Description:
[h1]Lox Virtual Machine[/h1]
This Mod enables a Motherboard with a Virtual Lox Machine. Install the Lox Motherboard inside a computer, choose your Script and run it. Place you Script inside %userdata%\Documents\My Games\Stationeers\scripts\Lox
[b]WARNING:[/b] This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://jixxed.github.io/StationeersMods/
ModMetadata.InGameDescription: Lox VM Motherboard This Mod enables a Motherboard with a Virtual Lox Machine. Install the Lox Motherboard inside a computer, choose your Script and run it. Place you Script inside %userdata%\Documents\My Games\Stationeers\scripts\Lox WARNING: This is a StationeersMods Plugin Mod. It requires Bepinex to be installed with the StationeersMods plugin. See: https://jixxed.github.io/StationeersMods/
ModMetadata.ChangeLog: [h3]Version 0.5:xxx[/h3] [*]Stationeers API defined [*]Device Classes Framework introduced [*]defined few classes for testing purpose [list] [*]Eventsystem implemented [/list] [h3]Version 0.4:[/h3] [list] [*]Eventsystem implemented [/list] [h3]Version 0.3:[/h3] [list] [*]Framework Lua Modules [/list] [h3]Version 0.2:[/h3] [list] [*]First attempts using MoonSharp [/list] [h3]Version 0.1:[/h3] [list] [*]First attempts using Wren Virtual Machine [/list]
